import React,{useState,useCallback} from 'react' import Button from '../Button' import img from './profile3.jpeg' function FriendRecomendation(props){ function handleClick(event){ event.target.innerHTML = "Friend request sent" event.target.disabled = true props.method(event.target.name) } return(

{props.name}

{props.mutual} mutual friends

) } export default FriendRecomendation
